title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Recommendation Systems
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable recommendation algorithms, optimize model performance, conduct A/B testing, and collaborate with product teams to improve user engagement through personalized recommendations.
requirements_text: 5+ years of ML experience, strong background in recommendation systems, proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks.

title: NLP Research Scientist
responsibilities: Develop state-of-the-art NLP models, publish research papers, implement transformer-based architectures, and push the boundaries of language understanding.
requirements_text: PhD in CS/ML or equivalent experience, strong publication record, expertise in transformer models and NLP.

title: Search Engineer
responsibilities: Build and optimize search infrastructure, implement ranking algorithms, improve search relevance, and maintain large-scale search systems.
requirements_text: 3+ years experience with search technologies, strong understanding of information retrieval and ranking algorithms.

title: LLM Engineer
responsibilities: Fine-tune large language models, implement RAG systems, optimize prompt engineering workflows, and build LLM-powered applications.
requirements_text: Experience with LLMs, strong Python skills, familiarity with prompt engineering and vector databases.

title: Data Scientist - Personalization
responsibilities: Analyze user behavior data, build predictive models, design experiments, and develop personalization strategies to improve user experience.
requirements_text: Strong statistical background, experience with ML and data analysis, proficiency in Python and SQL.

title: Backend Engineer - Microservices
responsibilities: Design and develop microservices architecture, implement RESTful APIs, ensure system scalability and reliability, and optimize backend performance.
requirements_text: 4+ years backend development experience, strong knowledge of microservices patterns and cloud platforms.

title: Data Engineer
responsibilities: Build and maintain data pipelines, design data warehouse architecture, optimize ETL processes, and ensure data quality and availability.
requirements_text: Experience with big data technologies, strong SQL skills, knowledge of data modeling and warehouse design.

title: Full Stack ML Engineer
responsibilities: Develop end-to-end ML applications, build frontend interfaces for ML models, implement backend APIs, and deploy models to production.
requirements_text: Experience with both ML and web development, proficiency in Python and JavaScript frameworks.

title: NLP Engineer - Conversational AI
responsibilities: Build chatbots and conversational interfaces, implement intent recognition and entity extraction, fine-tune language models for dialogue systems.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and dialogue systems, knowledge of transformer models and prompt engineering.

title: Recommendation Systems Lead
responsibilities: Lead recommendation team, architect large-scale recommendation systems, mentor engineers, and drive innovation in personalization algorithms.
requirements_text: 7+ years experience in recommendation systems, proven leadership skills, deep expertise in ML and ranking algorithms.

title: Search Relevance Engineer
responsibilities: Improve search ranking quality, implement learning-to-rank models, analyze search metrics, and optimize relevance algorithms.
requirements_text: Strong background in information retrieval, experience with ranking algorithms and search systems.

title: Junior Data Scientist
responsibilities: Assist in data analysis projects, build basic ML models, create visualizations, and support senior data scientists in research tasks.
requirements_text: Bachelor's degree in quantitative field, knowledge of Python and basic ML concepts, eagerness to learn.

title: MLOps Engineer
responsibilities: Build ML infrastructure, implement CI/CD for models, monitor model performance, and automate ML workflows.
requirements_text: Experience with DevOps and ML systems, knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools.

title: Deep Learning Researcher - Vision
responsibilities: Research computer vision algorithms, develop novel architectures, publish papers, and implement cutting-edge vision models.
requirements_text: PhD or strong research background, expertise in computer vision and deep learning, publication record preferred.

title: Backend Engineer - Python
responsibilities: Develop RESTful APIs, optimize database queries, implement caching strategies, and maintain backend services.
requirements_text: 3+ years Python backend experience, strong knowledge of web frameworks and databases.

title: AI Product Engineer
responsibilities: Bridge AI research and product development, prototype AI features, gather user feedback, and iterate on AI-powered products.
requirements_text: Experience with ML/AI and product development, strong communication skills, ability to work cross-functionally.

title: Text Mining Specialist
responsibilities: Extract insights from unstructured text data, implement topic modeling and sentiment analysis, build text processing pipelines.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and text analytics, proficiency in Python and NLP libraries.

title: Graph ML Engineer
responsibilities: Develop graph neural networks, implement graph algorithms, build knowledge graph systems, and solve problems on graph-structured data.
requirements_text: Experience with graph algorithms and ML, knowledge of GNN architectures and graph databases.

title: Ranking Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Design and implement ranking algorithms for search and recommendation, optimize ranking models, conduct online experiments.
requirements_text: Strong background in ML and ranking systems, experience with large-scale systems.

title: LLM Fine-tuning Engineer
responsibilities: Fine-tune large language models for specific domains, implement RLHF and preference learning, optimize training pipelines, evaluate model performance.
requirements_text: Experience with LLM training and fine-tuning, strong understanding of transformer architectures and optimization.

title: Vector Search Engineer
responsibilities: Build vector search infrastructure, implement similarity search algorithms, optimize embedding models, integrate with LLM applications.
requirements_text: Experience with vector databases and similarity search, knowledge of embeddings and retrieval systems.

title: Distributed Systems Engineer - ML Infrastructure
responsibilities: Build distributed training systems, optimize model serving infrastructure, implement fault-tolerant ML pipelines, scale ML workloads.
requirements_text: Strong background in distributed systems, experience with ML infrastructure and large-scale systems.
